OdometerConfiguration
OdometerConfiguration
Mode

Odometer mode options DISABLED  - 0x00 - Encoder is disabled SINGLE  - 0x01 - Single pulse input; one direction only QUADRATURE  - 0x02 - Quadrature encoder mode

mode
Mode mode() const

Get/Set the mode

uncertainty
float uncertainty() const

Get/Set the uncertainty (m/m)

scaling
float scaling() const

Get/Set the scaling value directly (pulses per meter)

scaling
void scaling(
float 
resolution,
float 
radius
)

Set the scaling by specifying the encoder resolution and the wheel radius.  Scaling = encoder resultion / (2pi * radius)

Parameters
resolution
float

encoder resolution (pulses per revolution)

radius
float

wheel radius (meters)

Note: 0 is an invalid value for both radius and resolution and will resulting in scaling = 0

m_mode
Mode m_mode
m_scaling
float m_scaling
m_unc
float m_unc
